title: Time to Ship

en: Dominique has set the beta-test release date for the first of next month, seeing as you're trying to get the product out by the month after. You, however, have yet to publicly release this date. A combination of fear and rebelliousness keeps you from doing it.

no_caption: Reflect on why this is hard

en: You release the date, and a wave of anxiety rushes over you. You're suddenly aware of every single thing you haven't done. You might drown under the weight of it all.
The only thing to do is work harder.
You take a day to reflect and examine what's causing this feeling. A bit of writing helps you pack away the fear - as much as it will be, anyways.
You release the date and feel a rush of energy. You're really doing this.
